Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Jump suit \Jump" suit`\, Jumpsuit \Jump"suit`\, n. 1. a one-piece coverall used by parachutists while jumping from an airplane. [PJC]
2. a one-piece garment resembling a jumpsuit[1], having a shirt or blouse attached to trousers or shorts. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Jump suit \Jump" suit`\, Jumpsuit \Jump"suit`\, n. 1. a one-piece coverall used by parachutists while jumping from an airplane. [PJC]
2. a one-piece garment resembling a jumpsuit[1], having a shirt or blouse attached to trousers or shorts. [PJC]
jump suit n 1: one-piece garment fashioned after a parachutist's uniform [syn: {jumpsuit}] 2: one-piece uniform worn by parachutists
jumpsuit n : one-piece garment fashioned after a parachutist's uniform [syn: {jump suit}]
